entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Barry's Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain or snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 08:57 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain or periods of snow early this evening. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 08:57 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Showers ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:57 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
